select.if: select distinct b.note_id, b.note_content, b.user_id, b.post_time,b.comment_num,b.add_num,b.sub_num,b.is_die, c.nickname from relation a, note b, user c where ((a.user_fans=#{user_id} and a.user_star=b.user_id) or b.user_id=#{user_id}) and b.is_die=1 and c.user_id=b.user_id and b.note_id<#{search_id} order by note_id desc limit 0,100
